```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
```


```{r}
data_raw <- read.csv("data.csv")
unique(data_raw$variable)
unique(data_raw$id)



wide_data <- tidyr::pivot_wider(data_raw, names_from = variable, values_from = value)


data_raw <- data_raw %>% mutate(
  ID_new = dplyr::recode(as.numeric(strsplit(id, split = '\\.')[[1]][2])))

data_raw <- data_raw %>%
  mutate(numeric_ID = map_dbl(strsplit(ID, split = '\\.'), function(x) as.numeric(x[2])))

data_raw <- data_raw %>%
  mutate(ID_new = as.numeric(sapply(strsplit(id, split = '\\.'), function(x) x[2])))


```


```{r}
data_1 <- wide_data %>% filter(id == "AS14.01")
data_1
```
